channel.title: fediverse on BinaryDigit
channel.description: Recent content in fediverse on BinaryDigit

item.title: Popular Social Media Apps
item.description: I go through this cycle every few months - get major FOMO from all mainstream social apps (Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, Bluesky) and want to post content there, and then sit back and realize it was all for nothing because I'm not missing *a thing*.

item.title: A New Beginning
item.description: A new beginning in many ways - In terms of travel I moved from New York City to Detroit!
